author: sseth
msg: MAPREDUCE-3460. MR AM can hang if containers are allocated on a node blacklisted by the AM. (Contributed by Hitesh Shah and Robert Joseph Evans)

author: sf
msg: - Add some error handling for writing to the output filter chain.
- Add some ap_assert()s for error cases that probably should not happen (and
These fix some compiler warnings about "variable 'rv' set but not used".
- Prevent a leak of a bucket in one error case.
